meanings.definition: Have in or be able to bring to one's mind an awareness of (someone or something from the past).
meanings.sent1: I remember my grandma's smile from when I was little.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to bring your umbrella when it rains.
meanings.sent3: I always remember to feed my pet fish, so they don't go hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a melody that I could always remember.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking is something I will always remember.

meanings.definition: Bear (someone) in mind by making a conscious effort to think of them.
meanings.sent1: I remember to call my friend on her birthday every year.
meanings.sent2: Do you remember to check on your elderly neighbor regularly?
meanings.sent3: I remember to water my plants so they don't get thirsty.
meanings.sent4: His kindness is something I will always remember in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset is a sight I will always remember.
